def MinesCounter::MinesCounter::show_counter (   self,
  screen,
  mines 
)

set up the counter

set the position of the counter, and fill with the initiate color then set the size of the edge and display it on the board

Parameters:
screen the screen the needs the counter to be insert in
mines the total number of mines of a specific level that should be shown as the beginning of the game, on the counter.
